entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
